title: My new one
content:
Well, I designed this one. (It has no name yet - any suggestions?) Your opinion?   
   
 ![My new one](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012230048im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/11655.gif)
author: tomzl

comments.content:
fine mixing of BAUHAUS and DIN, very nice numerals!   
i think the

Hey, this could be cool!   
Just give a little more room to your ascenders than your descenders: the former look stunted.   
   
hhp

I could even imagine a monospaced variant.   
   
Curious about what will happen in the fatter wheigths, if some are planed.   
   
--jacques
Yes, Jacques, working on them. They make more problems I thought they will. Maybe I will show bold version in a month. Thanks to everyone for comments.
